items.title: How to sell NFT based eBooks on Nalnda
items.author: Nalnda
items.description:
Dear Authors,

We are launching the Testnet of out decentralized eBooks marketplace Nalnda. To make it easier for authors to publish eBooks on our platform we are writing down the process to help the authors.

Step 1 : Connect to wallet

Create account on Nalnda marketplace using Sequence wallet. For this click on connect wallet option on the home page of the marketplace.

Once you click on connect wallet, a pop of sequence wallet will appear on the screen. To read more about Sequence wallet and why we have chosen it, please click here. Sequence wallet allows you to connect to crypto wallet using your Google, Facebook, Apple or your other email.

We are launching our platform on Testnet currently, do not forget to click on ‘Enable Testnet’.

Sequence wallet will take at least 30 sec — 45 sec to assign a crypto wallet address to your mail account.

Step 2: Update profile

Important: Authors wouldnt be able to publish titles without updating personal details

Step 3: Publishing eBook

Publishing eBook on Nalnda is a 30 sec task. Click on publish which will take you to publish page

a) Fill the Book Name and Author Name

b) Upload Book cover image, preview file and complete book. Please note, we only support .epub format only.

c) Set the metadata of your eBook

d) Setting the secondary market start date for your eBook

Secondary market refers to buy and sell of second hand eBooks ( by eBook owners/readers). Since we dont want eBook owners to sell their eBook copies just after the listing of of title on our platform, we have kept a window of 90 days where we will only allow readers to buy new eBooks (i.e. secondary market for that eBooks title will not be activated before 90 days from the listing date. For ex: if the eBooks is listed on our platform on 1st Jan 2022, buy and sell of second hand eBook’s copy will be activated after 31st Mar 2022.) However, on Testnet, to check this feature secondary market will be activated after 1 day.

Please verify details before submitting the eBook for listing

Once the author has submitted the title, it will go for approval. Author can check the progress under published tab in library section.

Step 4. Verify Details

We will check for the following before approving the title:

a) Plagiarism — Authors should not publish plagiarized content

b) IP Right — Authors should not publish someone’s else content without approval

c) Gibberish content : Authors should publish readable content that should make sense.

Content approval will take update 24 hours for approval. Once all the details are verified, we will approve the content and it will be visible on marketplace after 24 hours. Incase, author violates the terms and conditions and uploaded plagiarized/gibberish content or violates IP right the author will be banned.

Do test our marketplace and share your feedback on Twitter and Telegram.

About Nalnda

Nalnda is a decentralized marketplace for NFT based eBooks that allow readers to more than just read them and authors/publishers to have multiple revenue streams and earn a royalty on every secondhand book sale.

Website | Twitter | Night Owls Twitter | Telegram | Telegram Announcement | GitHub

items.title: Community Update: Mar’22 in action
items.author: Nalnda
items.description:
Dear Community members how was your last month? Were you excited or super excited!

Here is what we did last month. We had achieved our set milestones, gather, more support and grew our community.

Product Update

  1. Night Owls — We introduced our 10k NFT collection — Night Owls. Night Owls series is our flagship NFT that offers numerous benefits to its owners. Read more about Night Owls here.

We are 7.5k strong on NightOwls Twitter page.

2. Whitepaper launch — Do you want to know about our future plans? Are to curious to know why we are building Nalnda?

To answer these questions and many more, we have released our whitepaper. Dont forget to go through it. Lets us know your views about our product offerings.

Synergy and Collaboration

Nalnda believes in synergy and collaboration. Collaborating with other blockchain projects will allows us to build a better future and reach the audience easily. In March, we announced our strategic partnership with:

  1. Polygon Studios — Using Polygon blockchain, readers pay almost zero gas fees. A low gas fee is essential to our model since the cost of eBooks is usually low.

Using Polygon’s full-stack scaling solution, our marketplace will be able to facilitate faster transactions to the stakeholders. Read about the partnership here. Read about our partnership with Polygon Studios here.

Community Campaigns

We are currently active on Twitter and Telegram. Last month we ran two campaigns for our community.

  1. Funky Readers NFT Airdrop Campaign — Funky Readers NFT collection is a buyer’s discount code NFT offered by Nalnda. #FunkyReaders owners will get a discount on the purchase of new nBooks in the selected genre in Nalnda Marketplace.

The campaign will airdrop NFTs worth $10,000 to 500 participants by 15th April’22. We are thankful to our community for bestowing their love and support. On Twitter, the campaign received 87k impression in just 30 days.

2. Nalnda Weekly Contest for Telegram community — We love our community and that’s why we are organizing “Nalnda Weekly Contest” every week for top contributing members .

The rules are simple, maximum contribution to the Nalnda community.

April’22 Road Map

This month we have below mentioned action item planned for our project

  1. Winner list announcement of Funky Reader NFT Airdrop — 15th Apr
  2. Night Owls NFT — Website launch
  3. Nalnda marketplace — MVP launch for testing
  4. More partnerships and collaborations
  5. We will be hiring soon :)

Stay tuned for more update!

About Nalnda

Nalnda is a decentralized marketplace for eBooks that allows readers to more than just read them and authors/publishers to have multiple revenue streams and earn royalty on every secondhand book sale. If you’re a reader, author, or publisher, we invite you to experience the next revolution in the publishing industry.

items.title: Partnership announcement with Sequence Wallet!
items.author: Nalnda
items.description:
Nalnda is proud to announce its partnership with Sequence Wallet, a non-custodial wallet offered by Horizon Blockchain Games. Nalnda will integrate Sequence wallet into its marketplace for a smooth user experience for non-crypto native users.

Why this is an important step for us?

Using Sequence wallet, users will be able to log into our Web3 marketplace with their social profiles such as Google, Facebook, Twitch, Discord, and even Apple account. Users would not have to remember their seed phrase nor do they need to have any knowledge of blockchain to use the wallet.

The login process is as simple as login into any Web2 platform. In addition to the easiest user experience, it adds security and features provided by the blockchain. The wallet would allow the users to maintain their NALNDA tokens, nBooks, and our NFT collections Funky Readers and Night Owl all in one place.

We will be reviling more surprises on what all you can do in the Nalnda ecosystem using Sequence wallet in the coming day.

About Nalnda

Nalnda is a decentralized marketplace for NFT based eBooks. Our motto is “experience books beyond reading”. Nalnda allows readers to more than just read eBooks and authors/publishers to have multiple revenue streams and earn royalties on every secondhand ebook sale.

Readers are not the owners of eBooks, and it restricts the use-case of eBooks to just reading. In the Nalnda ecosystem, readers are the owners of the eBooks and are free to re-sell, lend, stake, and create an e-bookstore or library.

For every eBook that a reader reads on Nalnda, he spends 14% less as compared to buying eBooks and 30% less compared to the monthly subscription on major eReader platforms. Authors will earn 8% more from our model and can save an additional 8% on commission.

If you’re a reader, author, or publisher, we invite you to experience the next revolution in the publishing industry.

Website | Twitter | Night Owls Twitter | Telegram | Telegram Announcement | GitHub

About Sequence Wallet

Sequence is a non-custodial wallet offered by Horizon Blockchain Games, which also offers the free-to-play trading card Game called Skywaever. Powered by Web3Auth, Sequence Wallet is a Smart Contract that is deployed on the blockchain and which can be controlled by multiple private keys. These keys are meant to be controlled by the wallet owner and provide added security since more than one of these keys would need to be compromised for the wallet to be compromised.

Website | Twitter | Docs| Discord | GitHub

items.title: Night Owls — bringing change to 10k PFP NFT cult
items.author: Nalnda
items.description:
Night Owls — bringing change to 10k PFP NFT cult

Hola Community!

Who all are excited about the release of Night Owls 10k PFP NFT series? Well, you know that date is set — 15th May but before we release the first-ever NFT collection for authors and readers powered by the first-ever decentralized marketplace for NFT based eBooks, we want to take you on a ride to the parliament of the most awesome owls.

“ Night Owls” is a collection of 10,000 randomly-generated NFTs and the flagship NFT series offered by Nalnda. Each Night Owl is unique and comes with membership to the Nalnda ecosystem, which includes access to exclusive benefits and utilities.

The Night Owls are nocturnal birds who prefer to stay awake and active at night. They make plans to change the world while the world sleeps. Nalnda has decided to reward these Night Owls with benefits that never before.

Night Owls will own 4% of the total NALNDA token supply i.e. 20mn tokens

Benefits of being a night owl

  1. Night Owls is the flagship NFT collection of Nalnda. It is also the founder’s collection and the minting owners will equally share 4% of the total NALNDA token supply i.e 20 mn tokens.
  2. Each Night Owl has a set of ten unique traits (including background).

Two out of these nine traits are special and drive use cases on the Nalnda eBooks marketplace: Genre and Genre discount. The owner of the NFT will get ‘x discount’ on ebooks of ‘y genre’ for one year from the date he will purchase his first eBook on the Nalnda marketplace.

3. The Night Owl owners will have free access to Initial Title Offering. Participating in ITO will allow the users to access the auction of top-rated newly launched titles. The users will also become the distributed owner of the title and earn from all the future revenues from its sale.

4. And surprises for the future :)

Minting Price of Night Owls collection will be $200 each.

Night Owls collection launch

Night Owls will be launched on 15th May. We will provide waitlist spots to the owners of Nalnda’s Buyers Discount NFT collection — Funky Readers holders. Read about Funky Readers Collection here. The WL spot for the Night Owls launch will be given to the Funky Readers NFT owners in the following way:

  1. 1000 Funky Readers owners will be randomly selected for the whitelist spot for the flagship 10k PFP NFT collection ‘Night Owl’
  2. 800 owners from 1000 WL will get a Night Owls collection at a 25% discount or 1X the floor price discount whichever is higher.

If the floor Price of Funky Readers is less than $20, the selected 800 owners will get Night Owl at a 25% discount

If the floor Price of Funky Readers is, let's say, $100, the selected 800 owners will get Night Owl at a $100 discount

About Nalnda

Nalnda is a decentralized marketplace for NFT based eBooks that allow readers to more than just read them and authors/publishers to have multiple revenue streams and earn a royalty on every secondhand book sale.

Website | Twitter | Night Owls Twitter | Telegram | Telegram Announcement | GitHub

items.title: Introducing nBooks: NFT based eBooks
items.author: Nalnda
items.description:
Question: Why is there a market for second-hand physical books but not for second-hand eBooks?

The answer is ownership. Readers are the owners of physical books and thus are free to resell them. However, with eBooks, readers don't have ownership of them. In fact, the ownership of eBooks is with the Reader platform which charges hefty fees by selling them to the readers and offering pseudo- ownership to the readers. With this pseudo-ownership, readers can only read their eBooks but can't sell them to anyone. And this is where nBook comes into the picture.

nBooks are NFT based ebooks that impart an important property to the eBooks that had been missing so far: ownership. The NFT allows the transfer of ownership from one reader to another. Using NFT different types of eBooks can be minted based on features.

Type- There could be multiple types of copies of any title based on its cover design, the color of pages, graphics, and information on trivia.

No. of copies -Authors/publishers can set a number on how many copies a title will have. A basis feature will allow nBook to have an unlimited number of copies. A new copy will be minted every time someone buys the title. If required a title can have two variants with one having limited no. of copies (just like limited edition) and the other will unlimited no. as mass edition

Decay factor — Decay factor will be assigned to every copy of a used nBook. Authors will have the right to decide which type of nBook will have what decay factor

nBooks is the core of Nalnda's business model. To convert eBooks into nBook we use NFT 2.0 technology. The NFT 2.0 technology will use one NFT exclusively to access another NFT using public-private key encryption.

An overview of how Nalnda will do it:

the eBook will have two parts:

a. Content — The part that readers will reader

b. Book Cover — The part that readers will buy to access the content. Readers will be able to resell the cover just like any other NFTs. The new owner of the NFT will have access to the content while the previous owner will lose ownership of the content after selling it. Content and Book Cover will have a one-to-many relation

Content stored on decentralized storage can be accessed publicly using the CID ( Content Identifier). To make the content private and only accessible to the owner, the contract address of book cover NFT will be embedded in content NFT. This will only allow the owner of Cover NFT to access the content.

Feel free to share your queries regarding our implementation of NFT2.0 technology to NFT based eBooks.

About Nalnda

Nalnda is a decentralized marketplace for NFT based eBooks that allow readers to more than just read them and authors/publishers to have multiple revenue streams and earn a royalty on every secondhand book sale.

Website | Twitter | Night Owls Twitter | Telegram | Telegram Announcement | GitHub

items.title: Partnership announcement with Polygon Studios!
items.author: Nalnda
items.description:
Nalnda is proud to announce its partnership with Polygon Studios. Nalnda will launch its NFT based eBooks marketplace on Polygon blockchain.

Using Polygon blockchain, readers will have to pay almost zero gas fees. A low gas fee is essential to our model since the cost of eBooks is usually low. Using Polygon’s full-stack scaling solution, our marketplace will be able to facilitate faster transactions to the stakeholders.

Our strategic partnership with Polygon Studios is an important milestone. It will help us to get comprehensive support ranging from technology, marketing, community, grants, etc from Polygon Studios.

About Nalnda

Nalnda is a decentralized marketplace for NFT based eBooks. Our motto is “experience books beyond reading”. Nalnda allows readers to more than just read eBooks and authors/publishers to have multiple revenue streams and earn royalties on every secondhand ebook sale.

Readers are not the owners of eBooks, and it restricts the use-case of eBooks to just reading. In the Nalnda ecosystem, readers are the owners of the eBooks and are free to re-sell, lend, stake, create an e-bookstore or library.

For every eBook that a reader reads on Nalnda, he spends 14% less as compared to buying eBooks and 30% less compared to the monthly subscription on major eReader platforms. Authors will earn 8% more from our model and can save an additional 8% on commission.

If you’re a reader, author, or publisher, we invite you to experience the next revolution in the publishing industry.

Website | Twitter | Night Owls Twitter | Telegram | Telegram Announcement | GitHub

About Polygon Studios

Polygon Studios is the Gaming and NFT arm of Polygon focused on growing the global Blockchain Gaming and NFT industry and bridging the gap between Web 2 and Web 3 through investment, marketing, and developer support. The Polygon Studios ecosystem comprises highly loved games and NFT projects like OpenSea, Upshot, Aavegotchi, Zed Run, Skyweaver by Horizon Games, Decentraland, Megacryptopolis, Neon District, Cometh, and Decentral Games. If you’re a game developer, builder, or NFT creator looking to join the Polygon Studios ecosystem, get started here.

Twitter | Facebook | Instagram | Telegram | Tiktok | LinkedIn

About Polygon

Polygon is the leading platform for Ethereum scaling and infrastructure development. Its growing suite of products offers developers easy access to all major scaling and infrastructure solutions: L2 solutions (ZK Rollups and Optimistic Rollups), sidechains, hybrid solutions, stand-alone and enterprise chains, data availability solutions, and more. Polygon’s scaling solutions have seen widespread adoption with 3000+ applications hosted, ~600M total transactions processed, ~60M unique user addresses, and $5B+ in assets secured.

If you’re an Ethereum Developer, you’re already a Polygon developer! Leverage Polygon’s fast and secure txns for your Dapp, get started here.

items.title: Funky Readers NFT airdrop worth $10,000
items.author: Nalnda
items.description:
Hello Amigos!!

Are you ready for another airdrop from Nalnda? This time we are airdropping Funk Readers NFT collection to our beloved community.

About Funky Readers NFT collection

Funky Readers NFT collection is a buyer’s discount code NFT offered by Nalnda. #FunkyReaders owners will get a discount on the purchase of new nBooks in the selected genre in Nalnda Marketplace. Please note we have not launched nBooks yet. We will post an announcement once we will list nBooks on our platform. nBooks are NFT based eBooks that allow readers to resell them after reading.

Funky Readers NFT has been minted on Polygon chainto to keep the gas fee low. It consists of art from a variety of genres. Each NFT has genre and discount properties that will decide the discount offered on the book from the specific Genre.

Funky Readers NFT is an important stepping stone for our project.

Funky Readers NFT is an important stepping stone for our project. All the NFT owners will get additional privileges in the future. Including discount on nBooks, whitelist spot in Nalnda’s founding members NFT (Night Owl collection) drop on 15th May’22. Please read more about Night Owl 10k PFP NFT collection here.

Why this airdrop is important for the community

NFT holders will get the following benefits

  1. 1000 Owners will be randomly selected for the whitelist spot for the flagship 10k PFP NFT collection ‘Night Owl’
  2. Owners will get a discount on a selected genre of nBooks for 6 months. 6 months period will start once the owner buys the first book
  3. 800 owners from 1000 WL will get a Night Owls collection at a 25% discount or 1X the floor price discount whichever is higher.

If the floor Price of Funky Readers is less than $20, the selected 800 owners will get Night Owl at a 25% discount

If the floor Price of Funky Readers is, let’s say, $100, the selected 800 owners will get Night Owl at a $100 discount

NFT airdrop — NFT will be airdrop within 10 days after the airdrop ends.

About Nalnda

Nalnda is a decentralized marketplace for NFT based eBooks that allow readers to more than just read them and authors/publishers to have multiple revenue streams and earn a royalty on every secondhand book sale.

items.title: Introducing NALNDA Token (ticker $NALNDA)
items.author: Nalnda
items.description:
Hello Community!

We have been receiving a lot of queries regarding the utility of Nalnda native Token NALNDA (earlier NMT). So here is a detailed post on our native token.

Nalnda protocol will have multiple use cases and several stakeholders working in tandem on one or more of these use cases. For every stakeholder to work towards the benefit of the eco-system there will be various incentive structures that will incentivize everyone stakeholder based on their input. Nalnda marketplace Token (ticker $NALNDA) will be the native token of the Nalnda Protocol and will be used to incentivize all the stakeholders in the Nalnda ecosystem. Although the stakeholders will have the freedom to use fiat-backed stable coins for basic service (buys and sell nBooks), for all other use cases NALNDA token will be used.

NMT has the below-mentioned functionality in Nalnda Protocol:

  • Access — NALNDA is a utility token that provides access to the features offered within the ecosystem

• Staking — Staking NALNDA will provide special privileges to the holders

• Governance — NALNDA token holders will have the right to vote on proposals to change the system parameters.

Stakeholders will use NALNDA for the below-mentioned use cases:

• Publishers/ Authors — Publishers/ Authors will have to pay fees for listing and creating nBooks. This fee can only be paid using the NALNDA token. Publishers will also be able to incentivize readers with NALNDA tokens for reading specific books. This will help publishers to generate revenue from less popular works and market them.

  • Readers — Reading a book on Nalnda will incentivize readers based on the. of pages read and time spent on the platform. With time the incentive factor for a reader will increase or decrease based on the reader’s involvement on the platform. However, this incentive factor will have a minimum and maximum factor.
  • • Service Providers — Service providers can charge fees for providing services. This fee will be charged in NALNDA token
  • • Social Platform — The inbuilt social platform will allow readers, fan clubs, service providers, and authors to socialize and connect. NALNDA will be used as a tipping mechanism on this social platform.
  • • Traders — will have to stake tokens for participating in the launch of new titles

NALNDA will be an ERC-20 token launched on Polygon Chain with a max supply of 500 million tokens. Below are the token details on Polygon Testnet.

Contract Address: 0x93Ae5C4B1d10E6f58bc9CaB0b1277A4B459837DC

Block Explorer: https://mumbai.polygonscan.com/address/0x93Ae5C4B1d10E6f58bc9CaB0b1277A4B459837DC

Stay tuned for more updates about your favorite marketplace for NFT based eBooks.

About Nalnda

Nalnda is a decentralized marketplace for eBooks that allows readers to more than just read them and authors/publishers to have multiple revenue streams and earn a royalty on every secondhand book sale.

items.title: Community Update: Feb’22 in action
items.author: Nalnda
items.description:
At Nalnda we are excited to share our updates and growths with our beloved community.

Development Update

We have released our marketplace prototype on 1st Mar’22. Users can check below mentioned features:

  1. Uploading of eBook for selling
  2. Initial Title Offering
  3. nBook Staking

We will be releasing separate articles to discuss each of the above features

Community Campaigns

We are currently active on Twitter and Telegram. Last month we ran two campaigns for our community

  1. Airdrop Campaign — The airdrop campaign started on 1st Feb for 15 days however on community demand it was extended till 14th March’22. So far we received more than 8k unique entries Nalnda Market Place ($NMT) Tokens Giveaway (gleam.io). We are thankful to our community for bestowing their love and support. On Twitter, the campaign received 49k impression in just 15 days.

The two campaigns gave us tremendous outreach with more than 100k impression and almost 200k profile visits on Twitter

2. Meme Contest — We also launched Meme contest that will end on 7th March’22. We have received more than 80 unique entries. The campaign received 5k impressions on Twitter

March’22 Road Map

This month we have below mentioned action item planned for our project

  1. Winner list announcement of Airdrop Campaign — 15th Mar
  2. Winner list announcement of Meme Contest — 8th Mar
  3. Teaser of 10k PFP NFT — 15th Mar
  4. Announced of weekly contest for Telegram community — 4th mar
  5. Integration of Decay Algorithm in MVP — 20th Mar

Stay tuned for more update!

About Nalnda

Nalnda is a decentralized marketplace for eBooks that allows readers to more than just read them and authors/publishers to have multiple revenue streams and earn royalty on every secondhand book sale.
